name: Mini Clutch
description:
Perfect for when you only want to bring the essentials.
Inside there are 2 slip-on pockets.

This cute Clutch is made with love, unique and individual, no one else will have!

OUTER FABRIC
♥ Linen Cotton Blend Fabric 

LINING
♥ 100% Cotton Designer Fabric

FEATURES
♥ Twist Lock Closure in Antique Brass
♥ 2 x Internal slip-on pockets
♥ Twist Lock Closure in Antique Brass
♥ All corners reinforced with antique brass rivets

MEASUREMENTS (approx)
♥ Width - 23 cms (9")
♥ Length - 13 cms (5")

name: 50s Inspired Hobo Bag - Spring Flowers
description:
This bag was inspired by the bags in the 1950s. Back in the 50s, the handbag was literally a handbag, worn over the forearm. In this bag design, I sort of made the handle a little longer so it can be worn over the shoulder.

The flap and the twist lock keeps your stuff secure. It has a leather handle accented with rivets and spacious interiors wit 2 slip-on pockets reinforced with rivets!

Made with love ... unique and individual that no one else will have!

OUTER FABRIC:
♥ 100% Designer Home Decor Fabric

LINING:
♥ 100% Cotton Home Decor Fabric
♥ 100% Cotton Oxford

MEASUREMENTS (approx):
♥ Width: 12 1/2" (32 cm)
♥ Height: 10" (25.5 cm)
♥ Gusset: 3" (7.5 cm)

POCKETS:
♥ 2x Internal Slip-on Pockets

STRAPS:
♥ Length: 24" (61 cm) from end to end
♥ Width: 3/4" (2 cm)
♥ Drop: 7" (18 cm)

OTHER FEATURES:
♥ Natural Vegetable Tanned Leather Handles
♥ Rivets
♥ Twist Lock Closure
♥ Reinforced Stitching
♥ Heavyweight Interfacing

name: 50s Inspired Hobo Bag without FLAP - Black Japanese Linen
description:
This bag was inspired by the bags in the 1950s. Back in the 50s, the handbag was literally a handbag, worn over the forearm. In this bag design, I sort of made the handle a little longer so it can be worn over the shoulder.

This style has no flap so you can easily slip in and out stuff!
The leather handle is accented with rivets and it is made of high quality Japanese linen.

It has 2 internal slip-on pockets reinforced with rivets!

Made with love ... unique and individual, that no one else will have!

OUTER FABRIC:
♥ 100% Black JanpaneseLinen


LINING:
♥ 100% Linen
♥ 100% Grey Cotton Canvas

MEASUREMENTS (approx):
♥ Width: 12 1/2" (32 cm)
♥ Height: 10" (25.5 cm)
♥ Gusset: 3 1/2" (9 cm)

POCKETS:
♥ 2x Internal Slip-on Pockets

STRAPS:
♥ Length: 19" (48.5 cm)
♥ Width: 3/4" (2 cm)
♥ Drop: 7" (18 cm)

OTHER FEATURES:
♥ Natural Vegetable Tanned Leather Handles
♥ Rivets
♥ Magnetic Snap Closure
♥ Reinforced Stitching
♥ Heavyweight Interfacing

name: Zippered Tote - Thin Leaves
description:
This classic shaped Tote is simple and functional. 

It has spacious interiors, accented with rivets and brass O-rings attached to a leather.

The leather bottom keeps the bag sturdy and in shape.

It has 1 large external slip-on pocket with snap closure, 3 internal slip-on pockets and of course, zippered closure!

This bag is made with love ... unique and individual, that no one else will have!

OUTER FABRIC:
♥ 100% Cotton Designer Fabric and Black Canvas 

LINING:
♥ 100% Cotton Canvas in Lime

MEASUREMENTS (approx):
♥ Width: 16 1/2" (42cm)
♥ Height: 10 3/4" (27.5 cm)
♥ Gusset: 5" (12.5 cm)

POCKETS:
♥ 3 x Internal Slip-on Pockets

♥ 1 x Large External Slip-on Pocket with Snap Closure

STRAPS:
♥ Length: 16" (41 cm)
♥ Width: 3/4" (2cm)
♥ Drop: 6 3/4" (17 cm)

OTHER FEATURES:
♥ Brass O-Rings
♥ Leather Bottom
♥ Rivets
♥ Metal Zipper Closure
♥ Reinforced Stitching
♥ Heavyweight Interfacing

name: Ipad Case Sleeve
description:
This funky case is made to fit an Ipad snugly in place.

You can easily insert your gadget in the case and to protect the face of your Ipad, it closes with a canvas belt that you can simply slip in the leather buckle.

Measurements:

♥ 20.5 cms x 25.5 cms

Features:

♥ Designer Home Decor Fabric 

♥ Leather Buckle

♥ Eyelet

♥ Leather Thongs

♥ Fully Lined
